oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ellington Agricultural Center, the former Brentwood Hall residence of Rogers Caldwell, circa 1972
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the Ellington Agricultural Center at 440 Hogan Road, Nashville, Tennessee, as it appeared circa 1972. Originally part of the Brentwood Hall estate of financier Rogers Caldwell (1890-1968), the state-owned complex is now headquarters for the Tennessee Department of Agriculture and the Tennessee Wildlife Resources Agency. The complex is located approximately 10 miles south of downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 5 x 7 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Caldwell, Rogers Clark, 1890-1968--Homes and haunts--Tennessee--Nashville
